266:8: ekasmin samaye bhagavān buddhaḥ sāgaranāgarājāvasathe viharati sma sārddhaṃ sārdhadvādaśaśatabhikṣūṇāṃ mahāsaṃghena bahubhiśca bodhisattvamahāsattvaiḥ|
266:10: caturṇāṃ dharmoddānānāmabhidhāne kriyamāṇe tadabhidhānena caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇāmabhidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati|
266:12: sarveṣāṃ saṃskārāṇām anityatāyāṃ bodhisattvānaṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nirdiṣṭamakṣayajñānaṃ pravartate|
266:13: sarveṣāṃ sāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ duḥkhatāyāṃ bodhisattvānaṃ mahāsattvānāṃ rnirdiṣṭamakṣayajñānaṃ pravartate|
266:14: sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇām anātmatāyāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nirdiṣṭamakṣayajñānaṃ pravartate|
266:17: eteṣāṃ caturṇāṃ dharmoddānānāmabhidhāne kriyamāṇe tadabhidhānena caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇāmabhidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati|
266:19: āttamanaso bhikṣavaḥ sarve ca bodhisattvā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti|
266:21: bhāratīyopādhyāyena surendrabodhinā mahālocāvā-vandejñānasenena cedamanūditaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ ca|
